column2: ENGLISH

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We demand you pay us a part of your income as a tribute. If you do not comply we will attack you in 3 days.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
It looks like I have no choice.
You want war? You'll get war!.
Can't we make a deal?

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We accept your demand to become your tributary.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Excellent!

To [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

If you truly desire war, we are ready.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I doubt it.
It may not be worth it...

To [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I believe it would be mutually beneficial if we came to a different sort of an arrangement. We offer to pay a tribute in exchange for a 5 year non-aggression pact.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Very well!
Nice try.

To [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We decided that war with your pitiful realm is not worth the effort.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
That coward!

To [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We agree to your proposal of a non-aggression pact and look forward to receiving the payment for it.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I knew they would cave!

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We demand that you submit to our rule and become a proper vassal!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We accept your demand to submit as a vassal.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We kindly request that You accept our tribute in exchange for Your protection.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Accept
Maybe we can make a deal?

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We accept Your gifts and in return promise our protection.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We regret to inform You that we don't believe this protection business is worth our time.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We are unable to commit long term to your protection, however we offer a non-aggression pact for a small compensation.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We accept your non-aggression offer, you should receive your compensation shortly.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We reject your non-aggression offer as we don't see a benefit from it.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We offer you a release from you feudal obligation. In exchange you and your realm will become our Protectorate.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Absolutely not!

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We accept your proposal of mutual interest.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We reject your ridiculous proposal.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
